body: This doushin is beautiful and i'm interested to translate it in Italian but i don't know how to communicate with the artist

Nami x Luffy 4life. The doujinshi were good overall. But I found something quite weird. On page 22 there are two rings on Namis lower body. I dont know if its suppose to be Luffys hands around her waist of Luffys dick extending inside her pussy. But I found it quite weird and unnecessary.  ^^
